title: #ASKotec
description:
#ASKotec = Access to Skills and Knowledge open tech emergency kit.
The #ASKotec is a kit designed to work as a mobile trainer‘s set to tackle basic field challenges when it comes to Open Tech and Open Source Hardware innovation, education and repairing wherever needed.

Access to Skills and Knowledge« as a multi-functional »Open Tech Emergency Case« gives rural and urban innovators a new point of entrance.
